artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; naval battle scene; large ships on left and center image; explosions on right and center images in sky area; black sky with heavy rainfall; bright spotlights shining in URC of image and moves across center and left sheets; smaller ships seen in the distance in center right image
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: For the Fourth Time Our Brave Destroyers Raid Enemy Warships Outside the Harbor of Port Arthur
